name: Ultimate QTE Gameshow!
description:
This game was made for TriJam, a 3 hour game jam.

You are the newest contestant in the popular gameshow "Ultimate QTE Gameshow"!

Do you risk your money and go for the hard Quick-Time Event?

Or play it safe with the easy option?

This is a tiny, very unfinished and unpolished game purely for the fun of this jam.

Hope you enjoy it!
